<!-- ====== 倒计时（北京时间；当天整天显示祝福） ====== -->
<div class="card" id="countdown-card" style="padding:16px; text-align:center; margin-bottom:16px;">
  <h3 style="margin:6px 0 10px;">🎂 距离妍琦生日还有</h3>
  <div id="countdown" style="font-size:2rem; line-height:1; letter-spacing:1px; margin:6px 0 2px;">
    -- 天 --:--:--
  </div>
  <div style="color:var(--muted, #7a6f6a); font-size:.95rem;" id="countdown-date">
    目标：北京时间 10-30
  </div>
</div>

<script>
const BIRTH_MM = 10, BIRTH_DD = 30;

// 取“现在”的北京时间
function beijingNow() {
  return new Date(new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: 'Asia/Shanghai' }));
}

// 计算目标时刻与“今天是否生日”
function getTargetAndFlag() {
  const nowBJ = beijingNow();
  const y = nowBJ.getFullYear();

  const isToday = (nowBJ.getMonth() + 1 === BIRTH_MM) && (nowBJ.getDate() === BIRTH_DD);
  if (isToday) return { target: null, isBirthdayToday: true };

  // 不是当天：目标 = 今年 10/30 00:00（北京时间）；若已过则跳到明年
  const mm = String(BIRTH_MM).padStart(2,'0');
  const dd = String(BIRTH_DD).padStart(2,'0');
  let target = new Date(`${y}-${mm}-${dd}T00:00:00+08:00`);
  const now = new Date();
  if (target <= now) target = new Date(`${y+1}-${mm}-${dd}T00:00:00+08:00`);
  return { target, isBirthdayToday: false };
}

const { target, isBirthdayToday } = getTargetAndFlag();
const el  = document.getElementById('countdown');
const tip = document.getElementById('countdown-date');

function pad(n){ return String(n).padStart(2,'0'); }

function render(){
  if (isBirthdayToday){
    el.textContent = '🎉 生日快乐！Happy Birthday!';
    el.style.fontSize = '1.6rem';
    tip.textContent = '今天是北京时间的 10 月 30 日';
    return;
  }
  const now = new Date();
  let ms = target - now;
  if (ms <= 0){
    el.textContent = '🎉 生日快乐！Happy Birthday!';
    el.style.fontSize = '1.6rem';
    return;
  }
  const sec = Math.floor(ms/1000);
  const d = Math.floor(sec / 86400);
  const h = Math.floor((sec % 86400) / 3600);
  const m = Math.floor((sec % 3600) / 60);
  const s = sec % 60;
  el.textContent = `${d} 天 ${pad(h)}:${pad(m)}:${pad(s)}`;

  // 目标时刻（北京时间）的人类可读显示
  try {
    const fmt = new Intl.DateTimeFormat('zh-CN', {
      timeZone: 'Asia/Shanghai',
      dateStyle: 'full',
      timeStyle: 'short'
    });
    tip.textContent = '（北京时间）：' + fmt.format(target);
  } catch(e) {
    tip.textContent = '（北京时间）：10-30';
  }
}

render();
const timer = setInterval(render, 1000);
</script>

        </p>
        <a class="btn" id="gift-close" style="margin-top:6px;"> 🎉 </a>
      </div>`;
    document.body.appendChild(modal);

    // 打开/关闭逻辑
    function show(){ modal.style.display='flex'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden','false'); }
    function hide(){ modal.style.display='none'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden','true'); }

    giftBtn.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); show(); });
    modal.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{ if(e.target===modal) hide(); });
    document.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{ if(e.target && e.target.id==='gift-close') hide(); });

})();

<!-- 追加：在 .grid 最后插入一个可切换的双图轮播（不改上面任何内容） -->
<script>
(function(){
  const grid = document.querySelector('.grid');
  if(!grid) return;

  // 在这里填入你想切换的两张图片路径
  const imgs = [
    'photo/happy-cat-31.gif', // ← 第1张
    'photo/hapby-cat-15.gif'  // ← 第2张（改成你的图片路径）
  ];
  const caps = ['🐱', '🍰']; // 可选标题，想关掉就设为 ['','']

  // 外层：横跨两列 + 居中
  const row = document.createElement('div');
  row.style.cssText = 'grid-column:1 / -1; display:flex; justify-content:center; margin-top:18px;';

  // 轮播容器（卡片风格）
  const box = document.createElement('div');
  box.style.cssText = 'position:relative; background:rgba(255,255,255,.95); border-radius:16px; padding:12px; box-shadow:0 10px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.10);';

  // 图片
  const img = document.createElement('img');
  img.src = imgs[0];
  img.alt = 'Happy moment';
  img.style.cssText = 'display:block; width:min(92vw, 560px); height:auto; border-radius:12px;';

  // 标题
  const cap = document.createElement('div');
  cap.textContent = caps[0] || '';
  cap.style.cssText = 'text-align:center; margin-top:8px; color:#555; font-weight:600;';

  // 左右切换按钮
  function mkBtn(txt, side){
    const b = document.createElement('button');
    b.textContent = txt;
    b.setAttribute('type','button');
    b.style.cssText = `
      position:absolute; top:50%; transform:translateY(-50%);
      ${side}:8px; padding:8px 10px; border:none; border-radius:12px;
      background:#e4c1f9; color:#5a2f7e; font-weight:800; cursor:pointer;
      box-shadow:0 6px 14px rgba(0,0,0,.12); opacity:.9;
    `;
    b.onmouseenter = ()=> b.style.filter = 'brightness(1.05)';
    b.onmouseleave = ()=> b.style.filter = '';
    return b;
  }
  const prev = mkBtn('‹', 'left');
  const next = mkBtn('›', 'right');

  // 逻辑
  let i = 0;
  function show(idx){
    i = (idx + imgs.length) % imgs.length;
    img.src = imgs[i];
    if(caps && caps.length === imgs.length) cap.textContent = caps[i] || '';
  }
  prev.addEventListener('click', ()=> show(i-1));
  next.addEventListener('click', ()=> show(i+1));
  document.addEventListener('keydown', (e)=>{
    if(e.key === 'ArrowLeft')  show(i-1);
    if(e.key === 'ArrowRight') show(i+1);
  });

  // 触摸滑动（手机）
  let sx = null;
  img.addEventListener('touchstart', (e)=>{ sx = e.touches[0].clientX; }, {passive:true});
  img.addEventListener('touchend', (e)=>{
    if(sx==null) return;
    const dx = e.changedTouches[0].clientX - sx;
    if(Math.abs(dx) > 30){ dx > 0 ? show(i-1) : show(i+1); }
    sx = null;
  }, {passive:true});

  box.appendChild(img);
  box.appendChild(prev);
  box.appendChild(next);
  box.appendChild(cap);
  row.appendChild(box);
  grid.appendChild(row); // 关键：插在 .grid 的最后
})();
</script>
